description:
Ava Devine (ranked 13th) is back for her second match on US. With an impressive showing her first time out, Ava was eager to get back on the mat and take control. With her feisty attitude and tough spirit Ava is ready for anything.
Isis Love (Ranked 3rd) is our most experienced veteran on the roster to date. She is currently the only wrestler from season one who is still active.
The Goddess took control early and never let up. She overpowered the larger MILF, getting fingers into her often. Scoring points for outstanding holds (including body scissors and head scissors) the Goddess easily destroyed her opponent. Armed with our largest dildo, Isis went on to finish the job in RD4 by fucking Ava's ass until Ava was a shaking mess on the mat.
title: Isis Love "The Goddess" (16-7)
